TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit EnvironmentPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class EnvironmentPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class EnvironmentPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制對系統和使用者環境變數的存取。

span.span: Controls access to system and user environment variables.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 環境變數名稱會指定一或多個以分號分隔，具有個別的清單，針對讀取和寫入存取權的具名變數不區分大小寫名稱清單。Environment variable names are designated by one or more case-insensitive name lists separated by semicolons, with separate lists for read and write access to the named variables. 寫入權限包括建立和刪除環境變數，以及變更現有值的能力。Write access includes the ability to create and delete environment variables as well as to change existing values. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用方法，以防止不當存取系統資源所信任的程式碼。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 現在已過時，和資源的存取權現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制存取檔案，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並指派給它的權限程式碼可以存取的資源。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 如需在沙箱中執行應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 依照指定使用限制或無限制的權限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`所有環境變數的存取權。Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to all environment variables.

span.span: A list of environment variables (semicolon-separated) to which access is granted.

summary.span: 使用對指定環境變數的指定存取，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified environment variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式只允許其中指定的值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此存取權會套用至所有列出的環境變數。This access applies to all listed environment variables. 使用來定義複雜的權限。Use to define complex permissions.

span.span: The parameter is .

span.span: Adds access for the specified environment variables to the existing state of the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來修改環境變數存取加入至目前的權限狀態。Use this method to modify environment variable access by adding to the state of the current permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

param.name: flag
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示單一環境變數存取類型。

span.span: One of the values that represents a single type of environment variable access.

summary.span: 使用指定的 取得所有的環境變數。

span.span: Gets all environment variables with the specified .

returns.span: 所選旗標的環境變數清單 (以分號分隔)。

span.span: A list of environment variables (semicolon-separated) for the selected flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來取得目前的權限狀態。Use this method to get the state of the current permission. 若要取得這兩項`Read`和`Write`存取狀態需要兩個呼叫這個方法。To get both `Read` and `Write` access states requires two calls to this method. > [!NOTE] > `flag`參數僅限於值，代表單一的環境變數存取類型。The `flag` parameter is limited to the values of , which represent single types of environment variable access. 這些值是和。Those values are and . 可接受的值`flag`不包含和，這不代表單一的環境變數存取類型。The values acceptable to `flag` do not include and , which do not represent single types of environment variable access. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission/CS/environmentpermission.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission/VB/environmentpermission.vb#7)]

span.span: is , which represents more than one type of environment variable access, or , which does not represent any type of environment variable access.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Intersect (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Intersect(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限交集是描述的狀態兩者共同描述的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前權限是指定權限的子集，如果目前權限指定全部包含的指定權限的狀態。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsUnrestricted ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed
Public Function IsUnrestricted () As Boolean
public: virtual bool IsUnrestricted();

summary.span: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限表示聯集的權限的所有可能的狀態。An unrestricted permission represents the union of all possible states of the permission.

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.

returns.span: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Union (System.Security.IPermission other);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Union(System::Security::IPermission ^ other);

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示所有的狀態，表示由目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
